title: Setup
description: Configure your AI provider API keys and model preferences. Your keys are stored locally in your browser. You only need to configure at least one provider.
configureAtLeastOne: API keys are optional. You can browse and study cloned courses without one. Keys are needed to generate new AI content.
languageDescription: Language for the UI and AI-generated course content
syncApiKey: Save API keys to your account (syncs across devices)

apiKeyHelp.title: How to get an API key
apiKeyHelp.anthropicSteps: Go to console.anthropic.com → Settings → API Keys → Create Key
apiKeyHelp.openaiSteps: Go to platform.openai.com → API Keys → Create new secret key
apiKeyHelp.googleSteps: Go to aistudio.google.com → Get API key → Create API key
apiKeyHelp.discordHelp: Join our Discord — an admin can walk you through it (response times may vary).
